pageProps.content: We already know that when users click a mailto link (` ``` In addition to the `subject` parameter, there are also `cc`, `bcc` and `body` parameters. They'll be filled in the default email application if specified. ```html ``` It's worth noting that the `subject` and `body` parameters must replace the spaces with `%20`. There are some [online tool](https://mailtolinkgenerator.com) to [generate](https://mailtolink.me) the final mailto link for us. > If you want to use multiple email addresses in the `cc` and `bcc` parameters, then separate them with commas (`,`)
